programs.title: Bachelor of Arts in English with Single Subject Matter Preparation
programs.excerpt: Gain the perceptiveness, motivation, and training needed to succeed at the managerial level in the business world. You’ll explore business and management fundamentals applicable to any field and company size.

programs.title: Bachelor of Arts in English
programs.excerpt: Explore the world of literature, language, and linguistics, and gain the communication skills necessary for advancement in any field.

programs.title: Bachelor of Arts in Early Childhood Education (BAECE)
programs.excerpt: Become an early childhood educator, and work with children ages 8 and younger. You’ll use play and other learning tools to address the physical, intellectual, language, emotional, and social needs of children.

programs.title: Bachelor of Arts in Integrated Marketing Communications
programs.excerpt: Apply modern tools to the ancient art of persuasion. Gain an overview of marketing principles and practices, and prepare for a career in marketing, advertising, public relations, and other persuasive fields.
